name: nmrg_event-booking-app
description: Desgining the GraphQL API: -------------------------- * you are required to create to event booking API and also a frontend for it. * Main entities:   * Events   * Users * Users can book events and Events can be booked by users. * Some users can also able to create an Event. * Events therefore has CRUD operations. * Our users are connected to them who creates/updates the events * While getting the events, you might want to filter by    * all events   * all events created by particular user   * all events booked by a particular user * Users can be created and can be logged in essentially. * Users can able to interact with events by booking or cancel a booking.
